statements: SELECT * FROM TicketAvailability;
SELECT ticket_name, ticket_price FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_name, ticket_price FROM TicketAvailability WHERE total_quantity > 50;
SELECT ticket_name, current_quantity FROM TicketAvailability ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_quantity) AS total_tickets_available FROM TicketAvailability;
SELECT * FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_name LIKE 'VIP%' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT ticket_name, current_quantity FROM TicketAvailability WHERE total_quantity > 50
SELECT ticket_price, total_quantity FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_price > 100 AND current_quantity < total_quantity
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_name FROM TicketAvailability WHERE current_quantity < total_quantity ORDER BY ticket_id ASC
SELECT ticket_name, ticket_price FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, ticket_name, availability FROM tickets WHERE availability between 1 and 5;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE quantity >= 2 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE price < 50;
SELECT id, ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE availability > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY ticket_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_name, ts.quantity, ts.total_price FROM ticket_sales ts JOIN tickets t ON ts.ticket_id = t.id WHERE ts.quantity >= 3 AND ts.total_price > 100 ORDER BY ts.total_price DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_name, t.price, ts.sale_date FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_sales ts ON t.id = ts.ticket_id WHERE ts.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY ts.sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT t.ticket_name, a.remaining_quantity FROM tickets t JOIN availability a ON t.ticket_id = a.ticket_id WHERE a.remaining_quantity > 0;
SELECT ticket_name, price FROM tickets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ticket_name, price FROM tickets WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY ticket_name;
SELECT sale_id, ticket_id, sale_time FROM sales ORDER BY sale_time ASC;
SELECT ticket_name, price, quantity FROM tickets WHERE price > 50 AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY ticket_name;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.ticket_name, a.remaining_quantity FROM tickets t JOIN availability a ON t.ticket_id = a.ticket_id ORDER BY t.ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE tickets_available > 0;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE tickets_available > 0 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT sales.sale_id, events.event_name, tickets.ticket_price, ticket_sales.sale_quantity FROM sales JOIN events ON sales.event_id = events.event_id JOIN tickets ON sales.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id ORDER BY ticket_sales.sale_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_event;
SELECT event_name, event_date, total_tickets FROM ticket_event WHERE available_tickets > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, booking_status FROM ticket_booking WHERE booking_status = 'CONFIRMED';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_amount FROM ticket_sale ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_event;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM ticket_event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT booking_id, event_id, customer_id FROM ticket_booking WHERE booking_status='Confirmed' LIMIT 10;
SELECT total_amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
